string.name: files_few
string.translation_description: The phrase for 'few' files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of 'small' numbers. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number. The number is a small number.

resources.string: %1$d ไฟล์

string.name: files_many
string.translation_description: The phrase for 'many' files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of 'large' numbers. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number. The number is a large number.

resources.string: %1$d ไฟล์

string.name: files_one
string.translation_description: The phrase for 1 file. This is used when the language requires special treatment of numbers like one. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

resources.string: 1 ไฟล์

string.name: files_other
string.translation_description: The phrase for 'other' files. This is used when the language does not require special treatment of the given quantity (as with all numbers in Chinese). See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number.

resources.string: %1$d ไฟล์

string.name: files_two
string.translation_description: The phrase for 2 files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of numbers like two. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

resources.string: 2 ไฟล์

string.name: files_zero
string.translation_description: The phrase for 0 files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of the number 0. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

resources.string: 0 ไฟล์
